description:
Error: Runtime join error. 
Problem Description: When trying to join two sets, an unexpected runtime error occurs when attempting to join a set of integers with a set of strings. The program fails to join the two sets together and terminates unexpectedly.
code:
# Program to demonstrate the use of Sets in Python

# Create an empty set
my_set = set()

# Add elements to the set
my_set.add(1)
my_set.add(2)
my_set.add(3
